company_info.mission_statement: Securing the decentralized future through rigorous smart contract auditing.

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.description: GPT-4 explains your contract logic in plain English, identifying issues that static analyzers miss.

features.title: Advanced Security Scanning
features.description: Integrates Slither and Mythril to detect reentrancy, overflow, and logic flaws automatically.

features.title: Regulatory Compliance
features.description: Maps your code to MiCA, SEC, and FATF requirements, flagging violations before they become liabilities.

features.title: 60-Second Results
features.description: Get comprehensive audit reports in seconds, not weeks. Perfect for rapid development cycles.

features.title: Developer-First

features.title: Multi-Chain Support

how_it_works.title: Upload Contract
how_it_works.description: Paste your Solidity/Vyper code or upload a file. Support for all EVM chains.

how_it_works.title: AI Analysis
how_it_works.description: Our system scans for vulnerabilities, explains logic, and checks compliance in 60 seconds.
